languages.text: "Да вот вы их, меры эти, все и видите! Мы стоим, пакость жжем, ребята охраняют, чтоб никто не выбежал. Мин натыкали — от души! — для тех же целей. Воду, канализацию — все перекрыли, чтоб не было сообщения из этого блока вовне. Воздух только открыт, да вроде по воздуху оно не распространяется — вне зоны странных смертей не было".

"You're looking at them! We stand here, burn the foulness, and we've got people standing guard so that no one escapes. Put some mines down — a whole load of them — for the same reasons. The water, the sewers — all blocked off, to stop any communications getting out. The air's open, I s'pose, but the foulness doesn't seem to be airborne — there haven't been any strange deaths outside the district."
languages.original_text: "Да вот вы их, меры эти, все и видите! Мы стоим, пакость жжем, ребята охраняют, чтоб никто не выбежал. Мин натыкали — от души! — для тех же целей. Воду, канализацию — все перекрыли, чтоб не было сообщения из этого блока вовне. Воздух только открыт, да вроде по воздуху оно не распространяется — вне зоны странных смертей не было".

traits.locale_text: "You're looking at them! We stand here, burn the crud, the folks are standing guard so that no one escapes. Put some mines down — a whole lot of them — for the same reasons. The water, the sewers — all blocked off, to cut all communication with the area. The air's open, I s'pose, but the crud doesn't seem to be airborne — there haven't been any strange deaths outside the district."
traits.speaker: Footfall_DeraziterMain

traits.locale_text: "You're looking at them! We stand here, burn the crud, the folks are standing guard so that no one escapes. Put some mines down — a whole lot of them — for the same reasons. The water, the sewers — all blocked off, to cut all communication with the area. The air's open, I s'pose, but the crud doesn't seem to be airborne — there haven't been any strange deaths outside the district."

Put some mines down — a whole load of them — for the same reasons. The water, the sewers — all blocked off, to stop any communications getting out. The air's open, I s'pose, but the foulness doesn't seem to be airborne — there haven't been any strange deaths outside the district."
traits.speaker: Footfall_DeraziterMain

languages.text: “你这不是亲眼看到了嘛！我们就站在这里，负责烧掉一切脏东西。我们还派人站岗，以免有人逃跑。出于这个原因，我们还布了一大堆地雷。无论是水源还是下水道，我们都已经封锁了，以免那些东西传播出去。虽然空气依然能流通，但我估计这种污染不会通过空气传播，因为别的区域并没有爆发这种古怪的症状。”
languages.original_text: "You're looking at them! We stand here, burn the foulness, and we've got people standing guard so that no one escapes. Put some mines down — a whole load of them — for the same reasons. The water, the sewers — all blocked off, to stop any communications getting out. The air's open, I s'pose, but the foulness doesn't seem to be airborne — there haven't been any strange deaths outside the district."

traits.locale_text: “你这不是亲眼看到了嘛！我们就站在这里，负责烧掉一切脏东西。我们还派人站岗，以免有人逃跑。出于这个原因，我们还布了一大堆地雷。无论是水源还是下水道，我们都已经封锁了，以免那些东西传播出去。虽然空气依然能流通，但我估计这种污染不会通过空气传播，因为别的区域并没有爆发这种古怪的症状。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_DeraziterMain

languages.text: «¡Nosotros somos las medidas! Estamos aquí de guardia, quemando las inmundicias, y tenemos a gente apostada para que no escape nadie. Hemos colocado minas, muchas minas, por el mismo motivo. También hemos cortado el agua y el alcantarillado así no podrá transmitirse. Supongo que podría por vía aérea, pero no parece que sea un vector. No se han producido muertes extrañas fuera del distrito».
languages.original_text: "You're looking at them! We stand here, burn the foulness, and we've got people standing guard so that no one escapes. Put some mines down — a whole load of them — for the same reasons. The water, the sewers — all blocked off, to stop any communications getting out. The air's open, I s'pose, but the foulness doesn't seem to be airborne — there haven't been any strange deaths outside the district."

traits.locale_text: «¡Nosotros somos las medidas! Estamos aquí de guardia, quemando las inmundicias, y tenemos a gente apostada para que no escape nadie. Hemos colocado minas, muchas minas, por el mismo motivo. También hemos cortado el agua y el alcantarillado así no podrá transmitirse. Supongo que podría por vía aérea, pero no parece que sea un vector. No se han producido muertes extrañas fuera del distrito».
traits.speaker: Footfall_DeraziterMain

languages.text: 「見てくださいよ！私共はここに立って、汚染物を焼いて、そのうえ逃げ出さないように警備まで付いている。地雷の処理…それもたんまりだ…どれも理由は同じです。水に下水道…全て封鎖して、外部との通信を遮断する。空気は開けているけど、汚染物が空中に漂っているようには感じられない…地区外でおかしな死体は発見されていません」
languages.original_text: "You're looking at them! We stand here, burn the foulness, and we've got people standing guard so that no one escapes. Put some mines down — a whole load of them — for the same reasons. The water, the sewers — all blocked off, to stop any communications getting out. The air's open, I s'pose, but the foulness doesn't seem to be airborne — there haven't been any strange deaths outside the district."

traits.locale_text: 「見てくださいよ！私共はここに立って、汚染物を焼いて、そのうえ逃げ出さないように警備まで付いている。地雷の処理…それもたんまりだ…どれも理由は同じです。水に下水道…全て封鎖して、外部との通信を遮断する。空気は開けているけど、汚染物が空中に漂っているようには感じられない…地区外でおかしな死体は発見されていません」
traits.speaker: Footfall_DeraziterMain

languages.text: "Sie stehen vor Euch! Wir verbrennen hier die Fäulnis, und andere halten Wache, damit niemand entkommt. Dazu ein paar Minen – jede Menge sogar – aus denselben Gründen. Das Wasser, die Kanalisation – alles abgeriegelt, damit keine Kommunikation nach draußen dringt. Natürlich ist da noch die Luft, aber die Fäulnis scheint nicht durch Luft übertragen zu werden – außerhalb des Viertels gab es keinen einzigen ungewöhnlichen Todesfall."
languages.original_text: "You're looking at them! We stand here, burn the foulness, and we've got people standing guard so that no one escapes. Put some mines down — a whole load of them — for the same reasons. The water, the sewers — all blocked off, to stop any communications getting out. The air's open, I s'pose, but the foulness doesn't seem to be airborne — there haven't been any strange deaths outside the district."

traits.locale_text: "Sie stehen vor Euch! Wir verbrennen hier die Fäulnis, und andere halten Wache, damit niemand entkommt. Dazu ein paar Minen – jede Menge sogar – aus denselben Gründen. Das Wasser, die Kanalisation – alles abgeriegelt, damit keine Kommunikation nach draußen dringt. Natürlich ist da noch die Luft, aber die Fäulnis scheint nicht durch Luft übertragen zu werden – außerhalb des Viertels gab es keinen einzigen ungewöhnlichen Todesfall."
traits.speaker: Footfall_DeraziterMain

languages.text: « Les mesures, c'est nous ! On règle le problème par les flammes, et on a des gens qui montent la garde pour que personne puisse filer. On a aussi posé un bon paquet de mines pour les mêmes raisons. L'eau, les égouts... Tout est bloqué, pour empêcher toute forme de transmission. Après, y a toujours l'air autour, mais la maladie a pas l'air de se propager comme ça. On a aucune mort étrange ailleurs que dans ce quartier. »
languages.original_text: "You're looking at them! We stand here, burn the foulness, and we've got people standing guard so that no one escapes. Put some mines down — a whole load of them — for the same reasons. The water, the sewers — all blocked off, to stop any communications getting out. The air's open, I s'pose, but the foulness doesn't seem to be airborne — there haven't been any strange deaths outside the district."

traits.locale_text: « Les mesures, c'est nous ! On règle le problème par les flammes, et on a des gens qui montent la garde pour que personne puisse filer. On a aussi posé un bon paquet de mines pour les mêmes raisons. L'eau, les égouts... Tout est bloqué, pour empêcher toute forme de transmission. Après, y a toujours l'air autour, mais la maladie a pas l'air de se propager comme ça. On a aucune mort étrange ailleurs que dans ce quartier. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_DeraziterMain

languages.text: "Onlara bakıyorsunuz! Burada durup her türlü pisliği yakıyoruz. Kimse kaçmasın diye nöbet tutanlarımız da var. Sırf bu sebepten bir sürü mayın döşendi. Su şebekesi, kanalizasyon, ne varsa kapatıldı. İletişimi kesmek için. Geriye bir tek hava kanalları kalıyor ama semt dışında garip bir ölüm yaşanmadı, belli ki hastalık hava ile yayılmıyor."
languages.original_text: "You're looking at them! We stand here, burn the foulness, and we've got people standing guard so that no one escapes. Put some mines down — a whole load of them — for the same reasons. The water, the sewers — all blocked off, to stop any communications getting out. The air's open, I s'pose, but the foulness doesn't seem to be airborne — there haven't been any strange deaths outside the district."

traits.locale_text: "Biri karşınızda! Gelip ne bulursak yakıyoruz, kimsenin kaçmaması için nöbet tutanlar da var. Aynı sebeplerden bir sürü mayın döşendi, tüm iletişimin kesilmesi için de su boruları ile kanalizasyonlar kapatıldı. Hava kalıyor geri ama semt dışında herhangi bir garip ölüm yaşanmadı, belli ki hastalık hava ile yayılmıyor."
traits.speaker: Footfall_DeraziterMain
